AaCfPbBc.name: Explosive Wrath

AaCfPbBc.summary:
Resistance to Wrath(and only Wrath) becomes Fatal.
When hit, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down.

AaCfPbBd.name: Deep Bereavement
AaCfPbBd.desc: Turn Start: Lose 5 Speed and gain 5 Defense Level Down

- Gain 1 Attack Power Up & 1 Fragile

AaCfPbBh.name: Misshapen Painting

AaCfPcBg.name: Subject of Wrath

When this unit is killed, this effect moves to a different Identity.

AaCfPcBb.desc: Used to raise Atk Weight of certain Attack Skills

AaCfPcBc.name: Binding Technique
AaCfPcBc.desc:
- Max 3
- Turn End: increases by 1
- Turn End: gain Bind equal to the Value of this effect.
- Turn End: if at 3 Value, become Staggered for the rest of the Encounter.
Does not expire.
AaCfPcBc.summary:
Gain Bind equal to the Value next turn.
If at 3 Value, become Staggered for the rest of the Encounter.

AaCfPcBa.name: Determination
AaCfPcBa.desc:

AaCfPcBa.summary:

Turn Start: at less than 0 SP, gain 3 Attack Power Up.

- Clash Lose or After Unopposed Attack: Gain Breaking Heart and take 7 HP damage.
- Reduced by 1 at Skill End

AaCfPcBn.name: Breaking Heart
AaCfPcBn.desc:
- Every Sin Affinity Resistance is increased by (Value x 0.2)
- At 3 Value, become Staggered.

AaCfPcBp.name: Courage to Approach
AaCfPcBp.desc:
- Turn End: Heal 10 SP
- Gain 3 Attack Power Up and 5 Protection every turn
- When attacked, heal 5 SP. Gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn. (3 times per turn)
- Turn Start: If at less than 0 SP, gain 3 Attack Power Up.
- As long as there are 1 or more other surviving ally in this Encounter, Heathcliff's HP does not drop below 1.

AaCfPcBo.name: Determination
AaCfPcBo.desc:
- Turn End: Heal 10 SP. When attacked, heal 5 SP. Gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn. (3 times per turn)
- Turn Start: If at less than 0 SP, gain 3 Attack Power Up.
- As long as there are 1 or more other surviving allies in this Encounter, Heathcliff's HP does not drop below 1.
AaCfPcBo.summary:

When hit, gain 1 Offense Level Up.
Turn Start: at less than 0 SP, gain 3 Attack Power Up.

AaCfPcBq.name: Broken Heart
AaCfPcBq.desc:

- Clash Lose against Heathcliff: gain 3 Bind and 3 Damage Down next turn

Spent completely when the Body Part is broken.

FusionVibration.name: Amplitude Entanglement
FusionVibration.desc:
- Fuses the effects of the Tremor type added by Amplitude Entanglement and the Tremor type currently on the target together under Tremor - Superposition.
- Potency and Count values do not change over Entanglement.
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion on Tremor - Superposition, it activates as Amplitude Entanglement instead.
- Turn End: converted into base Tremor.

VibrationNesting.name: Tremor - Superposition
VibrationNesting.desc:
- Gained through Amplitude Entanglement
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion, add the effects of the resulting Tremor type to the list of active Tremor effects under Tremor - Superposition.

VibrationDistribution.name: Tremor - Distribution
VibrationDistribution.desc:
- Turn End: Gain ((sum of all allies' Tremor Count) / (# of surviving allies)) Offense Level Up next turn (max 5)
- For {1} turns, when hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by {0}
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

TcorpSpecialInvestigator.name: T Corp. Special Investigator Badge
TcorpSpecialInvestigator.desc:
-When this unit takes lethal damage, their HP does not drop below 1, instantly heals 80% of their max HP, and recovers from Stagger. (Once per Encounter)
- When this buff effect activates, starting next turn, this unit gains 2 Attack Power Up at every Turn Start for 5 turns.

VibrationChain.name: Tremor - Chain
VibrationChain.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- For {1} Turns: When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by {0}.
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)
VibrationChain.summary:
Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self
Raise Stagger Threshold by {0}

TimeRentalTwo.name: T Corp. Borrowed Time
TimeRentalTwo.desc:
Turn End:
- Gain {1} Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn.
- At 1 Count, gain {0} Bind next turn instead.
- Gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- If this unit has more Bind than it has Haste, the Borrowed Time effect expires and this unit gets Staggered.

TimeAccumulation.name: Time Delay
TimeAccumulation.desc:
As long as this effect is active, damage dealt against this unit is stored and not taken.
Turn End: reduce value by 1
Turn End: If there is only 1 value left of this effect, the effect expires after dealing (2 x stored damage) Sloth damage to this unit
When this effect is active, its value cannot be gained or be refreshed.

ParryingResultDown.name: Clash Power Down
ParryingResultDown.desc: In a Clash, lose Clash Power equal to the value

ParryingResultUp.name: Clash Power Up
ParryingResultUp.desc: In a Clash, gain Clash Power equal to the value
ParryingResultUp.summary: In a Clash, gain Clash Power equal to the value

LimitedTime.name: Stolen Time
LimitedTime.desc:
- Turn Start: At 200+ value, gain ({0}- 200)/50 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 200 value, gain (200 - {0})/50 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

OwnTime.name: Shared Time
OwnTime.desc:
- Turn Start: At 40+ value, gain ({0}- 40)/10 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 40 value, gain (40 - {0})/10 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

EquitableDistribution.name: Joint Time Expenditure
EquitableDistribution.desc: When spending Shared Time, the Brains spend an equal amount of time across the board.

UnfairDistribution.name: Infighting
UnfairDistribution.desc:
When spending Shared Time, the Brains no longer spend an equal amount of time across the board.
Turn Start: all parts lose Protection equal to the number of Parts with different remaining Time values.

TimeAcceleration.name: Time Acceleration
TimeAcceleration.desc:
- Gain 5 Speed
- Enhances this unit's Skills.
- Gain 1 Fragile; when Tremor Burst, Skill or Coin effect raises this unit's Stagger Threshold, it raises it by +50% more.

Yurodivy_LowMorale.name: Broken Unity

Gain 1 Fragile. Gain 1 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

Yurodivy_Panic.name: Broken Unity

Gain 2 Fragile. Gain 2 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

TimeKillerWatch.name: Time Relief Entitlement
TimeKillerWatch.desc: Targeted by the Time Ripper while Time Acceleration is active.

KeptBlood.name: Stored Blood
KeptBlood.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Lose 1 value every time this unit loses 5% HP.
- On Hit, heal 1% of this unit's HP

BloodyCrave.name: Bloodtinged Craving
BloodyCrave.desc:
- Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Damage Up every turn

- If this unit did not gain Stored Blood this turn, gain 2 Fragile, 1 Haste, and 4 Offense Level Up next turn instead of the above effect

BloodPocket_LowMorale.name: Bloodthirst

BloodPocket_Panic.name: Bloodthirst

HardenedBlood.name: Coagulated Blood
HardenedBlood.desc: Gain Offense Level and Defense Level equal to the value (max 5)

RedEyeFirst.name: Red Eyes

- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +1 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

RedEyeSecond.name: Red Eyes - Alert
RedEyeSecond.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +2 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)

· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring

RedEyeThird.name: Red Eyes - Devouring

- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

PenanceSecond.desc:

- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

PenanceThird.name: Penitence - Confession
PenanceThird.desc:

- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects

· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession

Emptiness.name: Only Ashes Remain
Emptiness.desc:

- When gaining Red Eyes with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by (Red Eyes gained)% of this unit's max HP (2 times per turn)
- When gaining Penitence with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ((Penitence gained)/2) SP (2 times per turn)
- Turn End: this effect expires

SinkingWhite.name: Butterfly
SinkingWhite.desc:
- Unique Sinking
- Base Value: 0, Max Value: 15
- When hit, the attacker heals {2} SP.
- When hit, and if this unit's SP is at less than 0, take {3} Gloom damage.
- Turn End: Reset The Departed of this effect to 0; gain Sinking equal to The Living(Potency) and convert The Living into The Departed(Count).
- This effect expires when both The Living and The Departed reach 0.

BulletLament.name: The Living & The Departed
BulletLament.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- Potency + Count = Max 20
- Consumed for certain Skills.
- When consumed, randomly selected between The Living(Potency) or The Departed(Count).
- Some attacks cancel if lacking Ammo.

TrainTeamCaptain.name: Training Team Captain
TrainTeamCaptain.desc:
Skill Slot +1
Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1
Turn Start: heal 15 SP
Increase the amount of Burn, Bleed, Rupture, Sinking, or Tremor inflicted by +1 (including 'Unique Status Effects')
Increase the amount of Poise or Charge(including 'Unique Charge') gained by +1
On Kill, Gain +2 E.G.O resource to the Affinity of the Skill that defeated the enemy; gain +1 E.G.O resource to rest of the Affinities

VioletUnderstand.name: Understanding
VioletUnderstand.desc:
- Deal +5% more damage per Stack
- Take +5% more damage per Stack
(max value : 5)

MentalCrack.name: Mental Fracture
MentalCrack.desc:
SP Loss Efficiency +1 per Stack (max 5)
Expires when it reaches 5 Stack, and take 10 SP damage
Lose 1 Stack per turn

ImpendingCollapse.name: Imminent Decay
ImpendingCollapse.desc:
Turn End: Lose 1 Stack
Turn Start: At 1- Stack, use a special Skill

ReloadLament.name: Reload
ReloadLament.desc:
- Consume (30 - (The Living + The Departed))/2 SP. (rounded down)
- Reset both The Living and The Departed values on self to 0, and gain the max value of their sum based on the probabilities listed in the Passive 'ISeeTheDyingButterfly.'
- On Reload, gain at least 1 of The Living and The Departed.
